summary: THE POWER STEERING IN MY 2010 FORD FUSION HAS WENT OUT. THIS IS A DAILY DRIVER FOR MY DAUGHTERS COMMUTE TO COLLEGE. TRYING TO TURN IT IS ALMOST IMPOSSIBLE AND EVEN MORE SO WHEN SHE IS IN THE CROWDED CITY. THERE WAS A RECALL UP TO 2011-2017 ON THIS ISSUE AND THE 2010 NEEDS TO BE INCLUDED!! THIS IS VERY DANGEROUS
